sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './Project.css'; // Import your CSS for styling import Top30Artist from './image/Top 30 artist .jpg' import Calandar from './image/Calandar.jpg' import SnapAndSign from './image/Snap&sign.jpg' import MosGames from "./image/Mo's Games logo smaller.jpg" import Renuem from './image/Renuem smaller.png' import Github from './image/Mohammed_github bigger.png' const Project = () => { const projects = [ { id: 1, imageUrl: Renuem, shortDescription: 'Renuem - Invest in Renewable Energy', longDescription: 'Renuem is a platform that connects users with renewable energy investment opportunities like wind farms and solar panels. Built a scalable app using React Native (Expo), with a Node.js and Express.js backend. Integrated AWS MySQL RDS for secure, real-time data management, and optimized the platform for user engagement and scalability.', githubLink: 'https://reneum.com/', }, { id: 2, imageUrl: Calandar, shortDescription: 'Clear Ear - Appointment Management for Clinics', longDescription: 'Clear Ear is an app designed to streamline appointment scheduling and patient management for hearing clinics. Developed with React Native to ensure a smooth user experience, integrating AsyncStorage for local data storage. Worked closely with clinic staff to deliver a solution tailored to their workflow, improving efficiency and reducing administrative burden.', githubLink: 'https://github.com/your-repo/clear-ear', }, { id: 3, imageUrl: Top30Artist, shortDescription: 'Billboard Hot 100 Data Analysis', longDescription: 'An in-depth analysis of the Billboard Hot 100 data spanning decades (1970–2024). Extracted and organized data using Python and Pandas, visualizing trends in artist performance and music genres. Built a dynamic web dashboard with React to present insights interactively, showcasing the evolution of music preferences over time.', githubLink: 'https://github.com/Mohammed-Bakhshi/web-scraping-Billboard-hot-100', }, { id: 4, imageUrl: MosGames, shortDescription: 'Mo’s Games - Gaming Website', longDescription: 'Mo’s Games is a website dedicated to showcasing gaming products and boosting customer engagement. Designed and developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create a visually appealing and user-friendly interface. Incorporated interactive elements to enhance the user experience and improve online visibility for the business.', githubLink: 'https://github.com/your-repo/mos-games', }, { id: 5, imageUrl: SnapAndSign, shortDescription: 'Snap & Sign - Document Collaboration Tool', longDescription: 'Snap & Sign is a web app for signing and sharing documents quickly and securely. Designed an intuitive user interface with a clean, responsive layout. Integrated WebSockets to enable real-time collaboration and updates, ensuring a smooth document-sharing experience for users.', githubLink: 'https://github.com/your-repo/snap-sign', }, { id: 6, imageUrl: Github, shortDescription: 'GitHub Portfolio - Showcase of Development Projects', longDescription: 'A personal GitHub repository featuring a collection of professional and personal projects. Includes detailed documentation, live demos, and well-organized codebases to highlight technical skills, problem-solving abilities, and a commitment to clean, efficient development practices.', githubLink: 'https://github.com/Mohammed-Bakhshi', }, ]; return (

My Projects

{projects.map((project) => (

{project.shortDescription}

{project.longDescription}

View on GitHub
))}
); }; export default Project;
